about_the_game:
Become an Acolyte of Zix and spread chaos across the universe in this fast-paced co-op VR action roguelike. Invade unique worlds to extract their elements, then use those elements to shape future runs. Explore and discover new combinations as you delve into Zix’s many secrets.

Between cross-platform gameplay across VR platforms, and an active spectator system allowing PC players to join in on a run, you’ll never need to unravel the grand tapestry of existence alone!


GESTURE-BASED ACTION

Express yourself with the FIRST INSTINCT combat system—designed to be easy to pick up but difficult to master. Use only the primary triggers and simple gestures to perform a wide variety of abilities and movements which flow together seamlessly to create an expressive and deep combat experience. Dash, jump, use swords, grenades, arrows, blasters, and shields, all without needing to look down at your controllers or press any face buttons.

RECIPE-ROGUELIKE PROGRESSION

Mix ingredients from three major worlds to procedurally influence the content of each run. Experiment with different combinations of elements to gain an edge in combat, uncover secret areas, and influence the environment. Unlock more complex recipes over time and mold the fabric of reality as you see fit. 

PROCEDURAL ABILITY AUGMENTS

Upgrade your core abilities with procedurally stacking augments and discover unique combinations every run. Experience countless emergent builds as you harvest chaos in service of Zix.

CROSS-PLATFORM SHENANIGANS

Play alone or with up to two fellow VR Acolytes. Asymmetric PC support allows friends outside of VR to join the game on their computers as active spectators. It’s up to them and their impish inclinations if they’ll help out or simply wreak havoc.

name: ZIX

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD R9 290 equivalent or greater.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A VR action roguelike with an expressive deep combat system and a player-driven procedural world generation system. Team up with friends across platforms as you remix runs and alter reality to uncover the mysteries of ZIX.
